description: Aoi`s appointed guardian and caretaker, she spent most of her life looking after Aoi and helping in her uprising. She`s also very active in the running of the Sakuraba Department Store. She`s generally very strict and enforces the rules of the Sakuraba summer house as the manager. Despite her initial dislikes of Kaoru and all of his friends, she learns to accept him because of the feelings that Aoi and Kaoru have for each other.
name: Kagurazaki Miyabi
